sentences.en: A bright shooting star, or meteor, is an unforgettable sight.
sentences.cn: 明亮的流星，或者说陨石，是番难忘的景象。

sentences.en: A visit to the museum is an unforgettable experience.
sentences.cn: 对该博物馆的参观是一次难忘的经历。

sentences.en: A visit to the Museum is an unforgettable experience.
sentences.cn: 参观博物馆是一段令人难忘的经历。

sentences.en: Every person stood to applaud his unforgettable act of courage.
sentences.cn: 所有人起立为他不可磨灭的英勇之举鼓掌。

sentences.en: For this reason, many travelers choose to return again and again to the unforgettable "Land of Smiles".
sentences.cn: 正因为如此，许多游客会一次又一次地回到那令人难忘的“微笑之国”。

sentences.en: He created many unforgettable characters in his novels.
sentences.cn: 他在他的小说中创造了很多令人难忘的人物.

sentences.en: He raised his hand to stop my words, looked at me with unforgettable reproach.
sentences.cn: 他举起手来不让我再讲下去, 怀着令人难忘的怨气看了我一眼.

sentences.en: He spent so many unforgettable days with them that he was loath to part with them.
sentences.cn: 他与他们一起度过那么多难忘的日子,他舍不得离开他们.

sentences.en: Hillary and I had had an unforgettable week, but it was time to get back to those opportunities.
sentences.cn: 我和希拉里度过了难忘的一周，但现在是时候我们回国抓住那些“机遇”了。
那是一次令人难忘的经历.
爱使得这些事难以忘怀.

sentences.en: Our journey by camel was quite an unforgettable experience.
sentences.cn: 我们骑骆驼旅行真是一次难忘的经历。

sentences.en: The trip had been unforgettable experience for both of us.
sentences.cn: 那趟旅行是我们两人难以忘怀的经历.

sentences.en: The war has branded an unforgettable lesson on our minds.
sentences.cn: 战争在我们心上烙下了永志难忘的教训.

sentences.en: They like to look back on those unforgettable years in the army.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢回忆在部队的那些难忘的岁月.

sentences.en: They noted down the time and date of this most unforgettable event.
sentences.cn: 他们记下了这件最难忘的事发生的日期和时刻.

sentences.en: We missed the lessons, but we gained this unforgettable amusing experience.
sentences.cn: 虽然误了课, 但都有一次难以忘怀的可笑的经历.

sentences.en: When it is examined with a telescope, the Milky Way is an unforgettable sight.
sentences.cn: 借助于一架望远镜观察银河时, 那是一副令人难以忘怀的奇观.

trans.tran_en: an unforgettable experience, sight etc affects you so strongly that you will never forget it, especially because it is particularly good or beautiful
